The following table shows the regular trading hours for the Japan Indices market:

WeekdayTime (Asia/Tokyo)
Monday09:00:00 to 11:30:00, 12:30:00 to 15:30:00
Tuesday09:00:00 to 11:30:00, 12:30:00 to 15:30:00
Wednesday09:00:00 to 11:30:00, 12:30:00 to 15:30:00
Thursday09:00:00 to 11:30:00, 12:30:00 to 15:30:00
Friday09:00:00 to 11:30:00, 12:30:00 to 15:30:00
